pullRequest.title: Allow INSERT null for SQL Server varbinary type
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fixes #4795
The original statement.setObject(index, null) in WriteFunction causes conversion error.

nodes.bodyText:
Can this be tested with DataTypeTest? Maybe we can have TestSqlServerTypeMapping stub?
(see #565)
nit: no need for a newline

This test seems to be passing even without changes in SqlServerClient.
Intentional?

afterCommit.message: Allow INSERT null for SQL Server varbinary type

nodes.bodyText: no need for a method, you can inline with test body
